item.title: How to get rid of the evil influence of bad dreams
item.summary: Mode of getting rid of the evil influence of bad dreams. In the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V.-15. 5160 rev.-5163 rev.). What Dia!kwain's mother did when she wished to get rid of the evil influence of bad dreams.
item.comments: 1) It seems the people address the Moon when they have bad dreams: it is addressed as 'Rider yonder' in the previous story (of a prayer to the Moon) as well as in this instance, 2) See also A prayer addressed to the Moon, and another version of the Moon and Hare story, 3) This story is found in Book V-15
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
